id_table_1.caption: Datasets used for training TinyChart. The benchmark datasets consist of basic chart understanding evaluations including QA, summary, and chart-to-table generation. Note that in ablation studies, we only use the benchmark datasets for training due to limited computational resources.
id_table_1.table: (1) Attention=softmax​(Q​K⊤d+log⁡s)​VAttentionsoftmax𝑄superscript𝐾top𝑑𝑠𝑉\displaystyle\mathrm{Attention}=\mathrm{softmax}\left(\frac{QK^{\top}}{\sqrt{d}}+\log s\right)V
